name: Breachers
abstract: Breachersâ„¢ is a tactical 5v5 VR FPS. Plan your assault or orchestrate your defense as a team through intense close-quarters combat. Climb, vault, rappel, swing, shoot & strategize your way to victory!

detail.app_languages: English, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Dutch, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Spanish
detail.app_release_note:
## Featured Content
- Added Top 50 Competitive Leaderbord in the main menu
- Added Competitive Season Countdown in the main menu
## Competitive
**MMR & SP Gain/Loss Changes:**
We added three things that will now be taken into account in the SP gain/loss calculations:
- Player's individual match scores
- Round differential
- Party size difference
**General Competitive changes:**
- Added temporary Competitive ban penalty to combat frequent leavers
- Added Random Maps for Competitive (players will have the choice between two randomly selected maps)
- Added End of Season Reward & Recap pop-up (for when Season 0 transitions into Season 1)
- Added cash distribution among AFK players when all active players are maxed out
- Fixed game getting stuck on "Cancelling Search"
- Fixed Competitive server getting stuck loading into lobby with VC still active

Check discord for the full change log.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
